channel.title: RuneAge | The Ultimate Adventure | 24/7
channel.description:
[center][u][size=36pt]RuneAge[/size][/u][/center] [center][size=14pt]The Ultimate Adventure[/size][/center]
Play now at http://www.rune-age.org
[u][b]Main Server Features:[/b][/u] [b]NEVER before seen custom quest with custom rewards (Age of Heroes Quest)[/b] - Dungeoneering w/ 8 Floors - 98% Summoning - Pets w/ Pet Shop - Perfect PVP - Safe PVP Box - Several Wilderness Areas - Barrows - Pest Control - Tzhaar - Warriors Guild - All Skills - Custom PVP/PK'ing Skill - Godwars - King Black Dragon - Dagannoth Kings - Tormented Demons - Corporeal Beast - Sea Troll Queen - Lakhrahnaz - Nomad - Giant Sea Snake - Avatar of Destruction - Money Pouch - Dicing - Player Owned Shops - Primal - Torva - Real Korasi's Sword - Flawless Combat System - Critical Hits - Fast Switching - x10 Hits - Slayer Rewards - 602 Animations - 602 Graphics - 474 Maps - 614 Items - Custom Items

item.title: RuneAge | The Ultimate Adventure | 24/7
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Kail Lord_Kail
item.description:
@Lord_Kail wrote:

[quote=“kill you704, post:8, topic:470219”][quote author=Lord_Kail link=topic=587617.msg4169340#msg4169340 date=1354074948]

Not and there lord_kail.
I actually might come play, very nicer server/website.

Off topic: RELEASE YOUR CROWNS, THEY ARE AMAZING.

Just go into the cache? LOL

He knows that, he just wanted me to release them so he wouldn’t have to leech.
[/quote]
That made no sense. People leech stuff from other people releasing ALL the time.[/quote]

I realize that, but me giving permission to use them would be a whole lot better.

Read full topic

[center][size=36pt]RuneAge[/size][/center]

Play now at http://www.rune-age.org

Main Server Features:
